file_content.text: A7-M1 = in awe of your success
You + Darth Arkous = executing major plans // A7-M1 = anticipating your results!
Sentients= scanned // Sentients = recognized // A7-M1 = honored to greet Imperial legends
Sentient = scanned // Sentient = recognized // A7-M1 = honored to greet Imperial legend
You = prepare for incoming transmission // Darth Arkous = Dark Council member // Darth Arkous + you = great allies!
So, you're the one the Emperor chose as his Wrath. Well past time we've had a proper talk, I should think.
Dark Lord. I consider it an honor to call upon a fellow member of the Dark Council in this matter.
The storied Hunter. You must tell me sometime what it's like being a virtual celebrity.
Intelligence was never under my direct purview, but I am well aware of the many exploits of the former Cypher Nine.
Such a fine assemblage of talent. The key element I've been seeking.
What's this all about?
You represent the last, most vital piece in my plan to shake the Republic to its very core. I'd say more, but it's better we speak in person.
I promise you, together we will change the face of the galaxy--starting with the planet Tython.
Docking bay coordinates = transmitted // You = see Darth Arkous now // A7-M1 mission = complete
A7-M1 = awaiting priority signal
A7-M1 = glad to see you again
A7-M1 = honored to greet returning legends
A7-M1 = honored to greet returning legend
You = prepare for incoming transmission
Hello. It's been too long. I wish I could say this was a social call.
I told you after the events on Tython and Korriban that I had particular concerns. Suspicions. I was right. The Empire is in serious danger.
I can't tell you any more over holo. Come see me on the planet Manaan at the nearest opportunity. All will be explained.
Priority = high // Travel to Manaan = imperative // Coordinates = transmitted
You + A7-M1 = covert Imperial heroes // Secret mission details = safe with A7-M1
A7-M1 = excited to greet you again!
You + A7-M1 = long-time allies now // We = unstoppable!
Priority holocall = incoming....
Glad I reached you. Our allies--they've found what we've been looking for, and it's... You'll be needed, let's put it at that.
Time is short. Come see me immediately so we might speak freely.
Lana Beniko = good Sith + sounding worried // You = help her
You + Lana Beniko = executing mysterious plans // A7-M1 += Curiosity!
A7-M1 = awaiting priority signal
